About Me


    Hi there! I'm Yuan, a Computer Science and Statistics student at the University of Waterloo. I am involved in volunteering activities since elementary school and have participated in multiple cultural programs such as RotarAct and YMCA. I am a genuine person who cares about the future of each endeavor.

    I enjoy working on data projects during my free time and polishing my programming skills. Currently, I am learning the ropes of data visualization and data science.
